title: How good is Realme 7i, and how different is it from Realm 7? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Ravi, Well as of now Realme 7i is not announced but there are some general seen in i series of Realme which I have mentioned below: Pricing : i series always tend be more affordable and more value for money.Setup : Sometimes you see a major downgrade in i series but sometimes you wontMarket : With i series Realme target a greater audience.

Realme 7i specifications leak: ✓ 6.5" Display ✓ 90Hz refresh rate ✓ Punch hole Screen ✓ LCD Display ✓ Snapdragon 662 ✓ Quad rear camera ✓ 64MP+8MP+2MP+2MP ✓ 16MP Front ✓ 5000mah battery ✓ 18W charger ✓ Rear fingerprint ✓ 8GB/128GB
